section.title: xx.fuldat
section.para: The xx.fuldat file lists the time step numbers at which full output is desired. The elastic solution (time step 0) is always included in the output.

figure.title: Format of xx.time files
figure.screen: # File containing time steps at which full output is desired. # # Comment lines begin with '#' # # Note: Time step 0 (elastic solution) is always included in the # output. # # List the time steps, one per line. # 10 50 100 ...
